EmailTemplate.name: 08_29_2014 VMworld Wrap Peak 10.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: Win a Hubsan Dronecopter | VMTurbo Wins at VMworld
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Following an epic week at VMworld®, including winning a TechTarget Best of VMworld Award <http://vmturbo.com/press-releases/vmturbo-wins-best-vmworld-award-virtualization-management/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=yodawins>, VMTurbo can't wait for its September 10 webinar with cloud service provider Peak 10 <http://go.vmturbo.com/registration-peak10-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=yodawins>. Register today, attend in two weeks, and claim a shot at the Hubsan X4 Quadcopter drone! Register Today <http://go.vmturbo.com/registration-peak10-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=yodawins> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
